reviewText: Love the film - wish it had more on  Burt and Malcom.
Delivered as scheduled. This was a great movie with good coverage of multiple motorcycle racing activities. Very enjoyable to watch and the picture quality was excellent!

Absolutely the best M/C film series. This 3rd one will not dissapoint.
Yes its worth buying & owning for multiple viewings.
Nobody has done it better than Bruce & Dana Brown.

Decent sequel. Does not attempt to stitch together any sort of a story, unlike the original. Great footage.

Wish it had more variety, more on trials, speedway, etc. The MotoGP footage is amazing, but the chase for the championship happened years ago, so its not timely. Of course, no movie can keep up with the speed of modern motorsports coverage.

When I walked out of the theater in 1971 after watching the original, I HAD to go ride my motorcycle. This one just doesn't light that fire.
FANTASTIC MOVIE!!  A MUST BUY FOR ANYONE WHO ENJOYS MOTORCYCLES!!
good update. I was not disappointed.
great to see the Brown crew in actin again
